title: Node UI Props
description: Node UI-specific properties that need to be persisted (eg. color, shape, style, etc...)

x.description: Visual X coordinate of this block in the model

y.description: Visual Y coordinate of this block in the model

grid_height.description: Manually defined visual height in grid-space units (unused if smaller than the minimum height based on other factors).

grid_width.description: Manually defined visual width in grid-space units (unused if smaller than the minimum width based on other factors).

label_position.description: Visual location of the block's label

directionality.description: Visual location of the block's label

show_port_name_labels.description: Flag that determines whether the block's port names will show within the block

port_alignment.description: Visual spacing option for the block's ports

parameter_heights.description: Height of the parameter value textarea for each parameter name
